backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining user profiles, cases, tasks, activity logs, and evidence with authorization checks and storage maps; includes CRUD-like logic and permission validation.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs for authentication, authorization gating, and onboarding flows.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of short summaries for all major frontend components, pages, hooks, and UI elements in the project.
frontend/android-twa/.gitignore: Git ignore rules for Android TWA build artifacts, keystores, Bubblewrap output, and IDE files.
frontend/android-twa/keystore/.gitkeep: Placeholder file to keep the keystore directory in version control.
frontend/android-twa/README.md: Documentation explaining how the Android TWA packaging works and how it syncs with PWA metadata.
frontend/android-twa/twa-manifest.json: TWA configuration defining app metadata, icons, colors, signing key, and Android build parameters.
frontend/docs/android-apk-build.md: Guide describing how to build the Android APK using Trusted Web Activity with prerequisites and steps.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base definitions and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point setting PWA metadata, manifest, icons, and mounting the React app.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app name, icons, theme colors, start URL, and display mode.
frontend/public/sw.js: Simple service worker implementing install, cache, fetch, and activate for offline caching.
frontend/scripts/sync-android-twa-from-p: Node script that syncs TWA manifest fields with the PWA manifest and writes updated values.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the root React app with theme, auth gate, app shell, and defines all TanStack Router routes for pages before rendering the RouterProvider.
frontend/src/components/accused/AccusedA: Provides a dialog for adding an investigation record to an accused, including optional file upload with progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/accused/AccusedF: Renders search and filter controls for accused records, including name, FIR, police station, and status, with a clear button.
Form dialog for creating or editing an accused record with fields for personal, FIR, seizure, and status details.
frontend/src/components/accused/AccusedI: Displays accused details and their investigation records, with an option to upload new records through a dialog.
frontend/src/components/accused/AccusedL: Shows a grid of accused records with status badges, FIR details, and actions to view details or edit a record.
frontend/src/components/activity/Activit: Form dialog for logging officer activities, validating inputs and submitting via useLogOfficerActivity.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access-denied message with principal ID copy and logout actions.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminOnly.t: Guards child content, showing an access-denied card if the caller is not an admin.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Main authentication and authorization wrapper handling login flow, permission checks, and profile setup.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Toggles login/logout using Internet Identity, clearing cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for creating a user profile with validation and error handling via useSaveCallerUserProfile.
frontend/src/components/cases/CaseForm.t: Form dialog to create a new investigation case, submitting data through useCreateCase.
frontend/src/components/data/LastUpdated: Shows a small badge indicating how long ago data was updated or loading/error states.
frontend/src/components/data/ManualRefre: Button that triggers a manual refresh and shows a spinning icon when active.
frontend/src/components/evidence/Evidenc: Form dialog for adding evidence to a case, validating inputs and submitting via useAddEvidence.
Main app layout with header, navigation, user menu, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/MobileNav: Mobile bottom navigation with primary, more, reference, and admin links.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskForm.t: Form dialog for creating a new task, selecting a case and submitting via useCreateTask.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, exposing login, clear, and identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for interacting with backend actor methods for user profiles, roles, cases, and other domain data.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light/dark themes and mobile layout behavior.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AccusedInformationPag: Displays accused records with filtering, searching, status tabs, and a form to add new accused entries.
frontend/src/pages/ActivityLogsPage.tsx: Shows officer activity logs with date filtering, manual refresh, sorting, and activity creation.
frontend/src/pages/AdminRoleManagementPa: Admin-only interface for assigning user roles by principal ID with validation and feedback.
frontend/src/pages/antf-reference/LawsPa: Displays NDPS Act overview and key legal sections using cards and scrollable layout.
frontend/src/pages/antf-reference/Module: Shows operational modules with objectives and activities for intelligence, enforcement, and investigation workflows.
frontend/src/pages/antf-reference/NdpsSu: Lists NDPS substances with small/commercial quantity thresholds and explains related punishment categories.
frontend/src/pages/antf-reference/Proced: Outlines detailed SOPs for search, seizure, and arrest procedures in ANTF operations.
frontend/src/pages/AntfStructurePage.tsx: Static page displaying the ANTF organizational hierarchy and jurisdiction with structured text and sections.
frontend/src/pages/CaseDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed case info, tasks, evidence, and allows admins to update case status.
frontend/src/pages/CasesListPage.tsx: Shows a filterable list of cases with status badges and a button to create new cases.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard aggregating counts of cases, tasks, logs, and evidence with quick refresh controls.
frontend/src/pages/EvidencePage.tsx: Lists evidence items with status indicators and supports adding new evidence.
frontend/src/pages/TasksPage.tsx: Displays and filters investigation tasks and provides a form to create new tasks.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers the service worker, logs status, and detects updates on load.
frontend/src/utils/authErrors.ts: Provides utilities to detect authorization-related backend errors and generate user-facing unauthorized messages.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with session persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, extended theme settings, custom colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, existing features, and new feature requests for the Narcotics Duty Desk app.
